title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from East Gippsland
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: Nine stories from the towns of East Gippsland in eastern Victoria.
description: The towns of Swifts Creek, Omeo, Lakes Entrance, Orbost, Marlo and Cape Conran are quite distinct from each other but all make up the region of East Gippsland, which lies in the south-east of Victoria. In 'ACMI in the regions: stories from East Gippsland', locals from each town are interviewed about their lives, their community and what makes living in these towns so special.
